item.title: [논문리뷰] Convolutional neural networks for sentence classification
item.description: https://arxiv.org/abs/1408.5882 Abstract pretraind word vector와 CNN을 sentence classification task에 적용하여 좋은 결과를 얻음 Introduction 이번 논문에서는, unsupervised neural language model을 통해 학습한 word vector를 이용하여 cn
